
0.2.0 / 2011-04-07 
==================

  * Added support to output all matches. Closes #5

==================

0.1.0 / 2011-02-08 
==================

  * Added `has-class` alias of `hasClass`
  * Added `is` support
  * Added `length` support (aliased as `len`, and `count`)

==================

  * Added exit status > 0 for `hasClass` failure

==================

  * Fixed `package.json` jsdom dep

  * Initial release
